scenes.intro_text: Impressive work, abi. Your talent for finding the path less traveled has led you to the Shifting Archives. Towering shelves of ancient books rotate in a mesmerizing, silent dance. A shimmering arcane barrier blocks the way forward, controlled by a lectern that displays a fleeting sequence of runes. This will test your sharp mind and memory.

challenge.prompt: The lectern flashes with ancient power. Memorize the sequence of runes before they fade!

scenes.intro_text: The barrier dissolves, revealing a long, dusty hall. At the far end, a colossal stone golem sits dormant, its body a silent testament to a forgotten age. It blocks the only exit. A nearby pedestal hums, etched with a single instruction: 'Activate to clear the path.' A smaller, frantic carving below it warns: 'Be ready to strike its core!'

challenge.prompt: You press the switch! The golem's eyes flare to life, and a glowing core is exposed on its chest for a fleeting moment. Strike it now!
